# GitHub Custom Instructions for Smooth Development

Write clean, maintainable code following project conventions. Use descriptive commits with clear messages. Create feature branches for new work. Review PRs thoroughly and test before pushing. Document changes and keep dependencies updated. Handle errors gracefully. Follow security best practices and semantic versioning. Collaborate respectfully; ask questions early. Break tasks into smaller commits. Use CI/CD pipelines, monitor code coverage, refactor regularly, stay consistent with style guides
